  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Should Teachers Give Technology a Chance?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrer geben sollte Technologie eine 
Wahrscheinlichkeit?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des professeurs devrait-elle donnent-elles à la 
technologie une chance ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deve professores dá à tecnologia uma 
possibilidade?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dovrebbe insegnanti dà alla tecnologia una 
probabilità?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θα έπρεπε οι δάσκαλοι να δώσουν στην τεχνολογία μια 
πιθανότητα;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Debe los profesores da a tecnología una 
ocasión?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer discusses whether and why teachers should try technology in their English classes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Artikel der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, behandelt der Verfasser ob und warum Lehrer Technologie in 
ihren englischen Kategorien versuchen sollten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de magazine 
d'ETNI, l'auteur discute si et pourquoi les professeurs devraient 
essayer la technologie dans leurs classes anglaises.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste artigo, que se publica no PANO do compartimento de 
ETNI, o escritor discute se e porque os professores devem tentar a 
tecnologia em suas classes inglesas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI, il produttore discute se e perchè gli insegnanti 
dovrebbero provare la tecnologia nei loro codici categoria inglesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, ο συγγραφέας συζητά εάν και γιατί οι 
δάσκαλοι πρέπει να δοκιμάσουν την τεχνολογία στις αγγλικές 
κλάσεις τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, el programa de escritura discute si y porqué 
los profesores deben intentar tecnología en sus clases inglesas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogische Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie éducative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia educacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia educativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτική τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tecnología educativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
